docs.snippet: The longtime Democratic congressman slated to become California's next attorney general immediately took a combative stance against Republican President-elect Donald Trump's incoming administration after being named to the post Thursday, promising...
docs.lead_paragraph: The longtime Democratic congressman slated to become California's next attorney general immediately took a combative stance against Republican President-elect Donald Trump's incoming administration after being named to the post Thursday, promising to defend the state's liberal stances on recreational marijuana, climate change, health care, immigration and criminal justice.

headline.main: California Attorney General Pick Pledges Affront to Trump
headline.print_headline: California Attorney General Pick Pledges Affront to Trump

docs.snippet: New Jersey Governor Chris Christie, an early supporter of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump, is considering a run to lead the Republican National Committee, Politico reported on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: New Jersey Governor Chris Christie, an early supporter of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump, is considering a run to lead the Republican National Committee, Politico reported on Thursday.

headline.main: New Jersey's Christie Mulls Run to Lead Republican Party: Report
headline.print_headline: New Jersey's Christie Mulls Run to Lead Republican Party: Report

docs.snippet: Indiana state officials have agreed to give United Technologies Corp $7 million worth of tax breaks to encourage the company to keep at least 1,069 jobs at its Carrier unit in Indianapolis, Carrier and the state said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Indiana state officials have agreed to give United Technologies Corp $7 million worth of tax breaks to encourage the company to keep at least 1,069 jobs at its Carrier unit in Indianapolis, Carrier and the state said on Thursday.

headline.main: Indiana Agrees $7 Million Tax Break to Keep Carrier Jobs in State: Company
headline.print_headline: Indiana Agrees $7 Million Tax Break to Keep Carrier Jobs in State: Company

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama has nearly ruled out any major last-ditch effort to put pressure on Israel over stalled peace negotiations with the Palestinians, U.S. officials said, indicating Obama will likely avoid one last row with Israel's government ...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama has nearly ruled out any major last-ditch effort to put pressure on Israel over stalled peace negotiations with the Palestinians, U.S. officials said, indicating Obama will likely avoid one last row with Israel's government as he leaves office.

headline.main: AP Sources: Obama Leans Against Last-Minute Action on Israel
headline.print_headline: AP Sources: Obama Leans Against Last-Minute Action on Israel

docs.snippet: Donald Trump returned to his campaign roots Thursday in his first major public appearance since Election Day, resembling the pugnacious, brawling campaigner more than the traditional president-to-be as he held court in front of thousands of adorin...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump returned to his campaign roots Thursday in his first major public appearance since Election Day, resembling the pugnacious, brawling campaigner more than the traditional president-to-be as he held court in front of thousands of adoring fans — and even announced a Cabinet pick from the stage.

headline.main: Trump's 'Thank You' Tour Gets Off to Raucous Start
headline.print_headline: Trump's 'Thank You' Tour Gets Off to Raucous Start

docs.snippet: Michael Venditto, the Republican incumbent, and John E. Brooks, his Democratic challenger, remained in a close contest amid objections from both parties....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Venditto, the Republican incumbent, and John E. Brooks, his Democratic challenger, remained in a close contest amid objections from both parties.
docs.abstract: Race for New York State Senate's Eighth District, covering South Shore of Long Island, remains contested as both Republican incumbent Michael Venditto and John E Brooks, longtime Republican running as Democrat, challenge validity of some 1,000 uncounted ballots.

headline.main: Democrats Claim to Win Senate Seat on Long Island, but G.O.P. Disagrees
headline.print_headline: Democrats Claim to Win Senate Seat on Long Island, but G.O.P. Disagrees
